file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
servers:
  - url: http://example.xyz
info:
  license:
    name: test licence
    url: http://example.xyz
  title: Example OpenAPI 3 definition.
  description: Example description
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: qa
    url: https://swagger.io/specification/#definitions
    email: email@redoc.ly

paths:
  /pet/findByStatus:
    get:
      operationId: GetExampleId
      summary: summary example
      responses:
        '200':
          content: 
            application/json:
              example: example
              schema: 
                type: string
          description: example description
        '404':
          description: example description
  /pet/{id}:
    post:
      operationId: addExample
      summary: summary example
      responses:
        '200':
          content: 
            application/json:
              example: example
              schema: 
                type: integer
          description: example description
        '404':
          description: example description
